Springboro Ordinances

Codified Ordinances of Springboro, Ohio

Download this project as a .zip file Download this project as a tar.gz file

CHAPTER 474 Bicycles, Motorized Bicycles and Motorcycles

474.01Code application to bicycles and motorized bicycles.

474.02Riding upon seats; carrying packages; handle bars; helmets and glasses.

474.03Attaching bicycles, motorized bicycles or motorcycles to other vehicles.

474.04Riding on right side of roadway; riding abreast.

474.05Lights, signal devices and brakes on bicycles and motorized bicycles.

474.06Riding bicycles upon sidewalks.

474.07Safe riding regulations for bicycles.

474.08Parking; locks.

474.09Parent’s responsibility.

474.10Suspension of riding privileges; impounding of bicycles.

474.11Operation of motorized bicycles.

474.12Safe riding regulations for motorized bicycles.

474.13Impounding of motorized bicycles.

474.14Paths exclusively for bicycles.

CROSS REFERENCES

See section histories for similar State law

Bicycle defined - see TRAF.402.05

Motorcycle defined - see TRAF. 402.21

Bicycles prohibited on freeways - see TRAF. 412.05

Motorcycle operator’s license required - see TRAF. 436.01(a)

Motorcycle headlight - see TRAF. 438.03

Motorcycle brakes - see TRAF. 438.19(b)
